headline: Nordson: Fiscal Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: WESTLAKE, Ohio (AP) — Nordson Corp. NDSN) on Wednesday reported fiscal first-quarter earnings of $133.4 million. The Westlake, Ohio-based company said it had net income of $2.38 per share.

headline: Nordson Corporation Reports Record First Quarter Fiscal 2026 Results and Increases Full Year Guidance
summary: WESTLAKE, Ohio, February 18, 2026--Nordson Corporation (Nasdaq: NDSN) today reported results for the fiscal first quarter ended January 31, 2026. Sales were a first quarter record of $669 million compared to the prior year’s first quarter sales of $615 million. The first quarter 2026 sales included an organic sales increase of 7% and a favorable currency translation impact of 4%, which was slightly offset by the medical contract manufacturing divestiture completed in the fourth quarter of last y

Sales were a first quarter record of $669 million compared to the prior year’s first quarter sales of $615 million.
